img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/09/Wukong_UpperHollow_10.jpg)
Finally, you can head up the torch-lit path outside this cave guarded by many Stone Spiders. At the end of the path is a small gap leading to a room that seems to be an entrance pit of some sort, as a large green Wisp floats above a bed of cobwebs. In fact, if you return to the Zhu Estate above and try jumping in the pit again, you'll end up in this very spot!
img_below_text:
Returning to the Upper Hollow Shrine, look for a small stone stair path up to the right past the shack, leading across to a large area brimming with assorted cocoons.
![Wukong UpperHollow 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/28/Wukong_UpperHollow_13.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 12 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Upper_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong UpperHollow 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/09/Wukong_UpperHollow_10.jpg)
Finally, you can head up the torch-lit path outside this cave guarded by many Stone Spiders. At the end of the path is a small gap leading to a room that seems to be an entrance pit of some sort, as a large green Wisp floats above a bed of cobwebs. In fact, if you return to the Zhu Estate above and try jumping in the pit again, you'll end up in this very spot!"
            - Following Text: "Returning to the Upper Hollow Shrine, look for a small stone stair path up to the right past the shack, leading across to a large area brimming with assorted cocoons.
![Wukong UpperHollow 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/28/Wukong_UpperHollow_13.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a character standing on a rocky ledge overlooking a cavernous area filled with cobwebs and stone structures. The scene is dimly lit with torches, highlighting the eerie and mysterious atmosphere. This area is part of the Upper Hollow, where the player navigates through paths guarded by Stone Spiders and encounters a large green Wisp floating above cobwebs. The image serves to illustrate the player's journey through a treacherous and visually striking environment, leading towards a shrine and a large area filled with cocoons.
